title: Humza Yousaf to launch SNP's 2024 general election campaign
description: Humza Yousaf will launch the SNP’s general election campaign in Glasgow on Friday with a pitch to “wipe the Tories off the electoral map”. The First Minister will deliver a speech to party members at the Oran Mor bar and venue in the city’s west end.

description: Rishi Sunak is due to hold a full cabinet call at 7.45pm tonight, which is thought to be about military strikes against Yemen's Houthi rebels.

title: UK PM Sunak to hold cabinet call on Thursday evening -report
description: British Prime Minister Rishi Sunak will hold a call with his cabinet of ministers at 1945 GMT on Thursday, the political editor for the Times newspaper reported. Sunak's Downing Street office did not immediately respond to a request from Reuters for comment.

title: I'm up for fight over nanny state accusations, says Keir Starmer

title: Bristol councillors approve new constitution but mayor declines to vote
description: A new constitution for Bristol City Council has been approved by a vote of all councillors, apart from Bristol mayor Marvin Rees. From May the council will be run by several committees of councillors instead of a directly elected mayor.

title: Lib Dems urge Ofcom to investigate GB News Post Office scandal coverage

title: Chancellor Jeremy Hunt accused of hypocrisy after complaining about gas drilling in his Surrey constituency
description: CAMPAIGNERS accused Jeremy Hunt of hypocrisy today after the Tory Chancellor complained about gas drilling in his constituency, while championing oil and gas exploration north of the border.
